tagline: Profiling, load testing, and optimization driven by data — not hunches
pros: Full-stack profiling: CPU flame graphs, memory analysis, database EXPLAIN, distributed tracing
Load testing design with realistic patterns — ramp, spike, soak, and recovery
Communicates in measurements, not feelings — clear before/after with P99 distributions
Knows when to stop optimizing — respects diminishing returns and engineering cost
cons: Won't optimize without profiling first — adds time upfront to save time overall
Large architectural changes hand off to application team
Needs monitoring infrastructure to be effective — can't profile what isn't instrumented
